title: Polymer & Fiber Process
description: Discussion of the principles of fiber formation from polymers including rheology, mechanics, energetics, phase transition, and polymer structure. High-performing fiber processing, and plastics processing.  Credit not allowed for both MSE 3230 and PTFE 3230.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MSE 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MSE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
